    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        void initialize(java.lang.String url,
              TransportChannelSettings settings)
                throws ServiceResultException
        Initialize a secure channel with endpoint identified by the URL.
        Parameters:
        url -
        settings -
        Throws:
        ServiceResultException

      • open

        void open()
          throws ServiceResultException
        Open the secure channel with the endpoint identified by the URL. Once the channel is open if will be assigned a secure channel id. The channel must be initialzied before hand. If the operation timeouts or the thread is interrupted a ServiceResultException is thrown with StatusCodes.Bad_Timeout.

        Throws:
        ServiceResultException

      • openAsync

        AsyncResult openAsync()
        Open the secure channel asynchronously.
        Returns:
        async result

      • reconnect

        void reconnect()
               throws ServiceResultException
        Closes any existing secure channel and opens a new one. Calling this method will cause outstanding requests over the current secure channel to fail.

        If the operation timeouts or the thread is interrupted a ServiceResultException is thrown with StatusCodes.Bad_Timeout.

        Throws:
        ServiceResultException - communication error occurs

      • reconnectAsync

        AsyncResult reconnectAsync()
        Closes any existing secure channel and opens a new one. Calling this method will cause outstanding requests over the current secure channel to fail.
        Returns:
        async result

      • serviceRequest

        If the operation timeouts or the thread is interrupted a ServiceResultException is thrown with StatusCodes.Bad_Timeout.

      • serviceRequest

        IEncodeable serviceRequest(ServiceRequest request,
                         long operationTimeout)
                           throws ServiceResultException
        Send a service request over the secure channel.

        If the operation timeouts or the operation is interrupted and a ServiceResultException is thrown with StatusCodes.Bad_Timeout.

        Parameters:
        request -
        operationTimeout - timeout time in milliseconds
        Returns:
        Throws:
        ServiceResultException

      • serviceRequestAsync

                              long operationTimeout)
        Asynchronous operation to send a request over the secure channel.
        Parameters:
        request - the request
        operationTimeout - timeout time
        Returns:
        the result

      • close

        void close()
           throws ServiceResultException
        Closes any existing secure channel and opens a new one. Calling this method will cause outstanding requests over the current secure channel to fail.

        If the operation timeouts or the thread is interrupted a ServiceResultException is thrown with StatusCodes.Bad_Timeout.

        Throws:
        ServiceResultException - communication error occurs
        RuntimeInterruptedException - the user interrupted the operation with Thread.interrupt()

      • closeAsync

        AsyncResult closeAsync()
        Closes any existing secure channel and opens a new one. Calling this method will cause outstanding requests over the current secure channel to fail.
        Returns:
        async result
